/** * renders a form allows user to create a new course * renders "Create Course" button that sends a POST request to /api/courses * renders "Cance" button that returns to list of courses */ const CreateCourse = () => { return (

Create Course

Validation Errors

  • Please provide a value for "Title"
  • Please provide a value for "Description"

By Joe Smith

) } export default CreateCourse;
